posts.post_title: PSA 5 (mk). 1887 Old Judge John Monte Ward
posts.post_content: Selling PSA 5 ( mk). 1887 Old Judge. John Monte Ward. $1500.  The mark is pencil initials on back. Email me for scans or questions.  Thanks, Don.   [url]Dhontz1@maine.rr.com[/url]
